p: Three cancer cell lines (HepG2, MCF7, and AGS) were obtained from NCCS, Pune, India. Cancer cells were grown in Dulbecco’s Modified Eagle’s medium (DMEM) media (Sigma-Alderich, USA) amended with 10% bovine serum, 100 µg/mL of streptomycin, 5 µg/mL of amphotericin B, and 100 IU/mL of penicillin and cultured at 37 °C in a humid environment and 5% atmospheric CO 2. All of the analyses were carried out as described by Tan et al. [ 31].
